1.title: Ice Cream Insanity
1.plot: Michael Chernow sets out to discover the most outrageous ice cream creations seen on social media. In NYC, Black Tap's whimsical and over-the-top shakes create an explosion of sweet goodness with every sip. Blending tradition into the mix, Ample Hills Creamery uses old school techniques to create playful flavors like the popular cream cheese vanilla bean ice cream infused with homemade buttercake.

2.title: Off the Menu
2.plot: Michael Chernow uncovers the most crave-worthy, top-secret dishes that never appear on menus. His first discovery is in Charleston, at Callie's Hot Little Biscuit where customer's line up to get a taste before it sells out. His next find is a bite-sized pillow of goodness - a pizza muffin specially crafted at Portland's Sizzle Pie that serves over 50 varieties of pizza.

3.title: Spice Night
3.plot: Michael Chernow is on a mission to find the spiciest bites from the hottest restaurants across the country. His first stop is a hip Los Angeles restaurant that puts a fresh spin on traditional Indian food with its spicy dishes and fiery five-pepper hot sauce.

4.title: Secret Restaurants
4.plot: Michael Chernow is letting the secret out on the most exclusive, hidden restaurants. Tucked away with a discreet entrance, NYC's Dinnertable is an intimate restaurant serves a creamy and crispy lasagna bolo not soon forgotten. One of the best-kept secrets in Portland, Basque Supper Club requires a password for entry and offers an exquisite six-course menu, capped with a melt-on-your-plate white chocolate, passion fruit flan dessert. Next, Michael is invited to Oxalis for Hollywood's most exclusive dinner party, where six invited guests are given the star treatment ...

12.title: Eggcellent
12.plot: A runny egg is one of the hottest ingredients in food porn. Michael Chernow's first "EGGtraordinary" find is a poached egg nestled inside a ripened avocado and wrapped in bacon, served at Estrella in the heart of Los Angeles. Next, he visits 5Church, a former church turned restaurant in Charleston, to witness the creation of a heavenly crab cake topped with a perfectly poached egg. Lastly, Michael heads to Onefold, one of the best breakfast destinations in Denver, to sample an EGGcentric congee dish- a fusion of fried duck, savory rice porridge and topped with a ...

1.title: Deep Dish Delight
1.plot: Michael hits the road, heading to Chicago for a taste of world renowned deep dish pizza. Then, he hits up San Francisco, where people are lining up for hours at a dim sum style hot spot for local, California cuisine. The next stop is Las Vegas, for a celebrity chefs famous banana cream pie. Michael makes a final stop in Austin for exotic sausages with crazy, unique toppings.

2.title: The Big Guns
2.plot: Michael hits the road, heading to Chicago for a taste of world renowned deep dish pizza. Then, he hits up San Francisco, where people are lining up for hours at a dim sum style hot spot for local, California cuisine. The next stop is Las Vegas, for a celebrity chefs famous banana cream pie. Michael makes a final stop in Austin for exotic sausages with crazy, unique toppings.

3.title: Lining Up for Yummy
3.plot: On this trip, Michael visits an iconic NYC pizzeria that's got one of the longest lines in the country for their classic Margarita pie. Then he travels to a San Francisco spot serving fresh pasta creations.

4.title: Mammoth Dishes Worth Waiting For
4.plot: On this journey, Michael heads to Austin where a spot is cranking out burger creations so deliciously good people are waiting hours to get their hands on one. Then he hits up a San Fran joint that's serving a giant bowl of the freshest seafood on the bay.

5.title: So Good You'll Bring It Home to Mama
5.plot: Michael Chernow experiences a feast for the senses with the delectable food masterpieces. The flavor of a vibrantly colored Thai sticky rice dessert lives up to its hype at Portland's Departure restaurant.

6.title: No Forks Required
6.plot: On this trip, Michael hits a spot that has LA lining up for hours. Eggslut is making egg sandwiches as naughtily delicious as their name implies. Then he heads east to learn the secret behind NYC's crunchiest fried chicken sandwich.

7.title: Sinfully Delicious Dives
7.plot: This journey starts at a windy city institution that's made the perfect combination of two beloved comfort foods--an ooey, gooey, pizza pot pie. Then its off to Austin, where a spot is making a spicy jalape o sausage that's so good, they even put it in cocktails.

8.title: Sweet & Savory Seduction
8.plot: On this trip, Michael heads to Chicago, where he hits up a legendary sandwich shop for a taste of the classic Italian Beef Sandwich. Next stop is San Francisco, where he learns how to make one of the most buzzed about breakfast creations on the internet.

9.title: Savory, Seductive and Sweet
9.plot: On this trip, Michael heads to San Francisco to try a new take on a classic New Orleans speciality. Then he makes a stop in Las Vegas, for the the biggest, baddest BLT. He'll also pass through Miami and hit up La Mar, which is known for their upscale Peruvian/Japanese fusion. He'll round out his trip in Chicago, where he hits up Black Dog for gelato that's both savory and sweet.

10.title: Stick to Yo' Ribs
10.plot: Michael hits the road, heading first to Atlanta for a taste of true Southern cooking. He'll then head to Vegas to feast on a giant fortune cookie like you've never seen before. Rounding out his trip is a stop in Chicago for classic British meat pies and finally to Austin for modernized Thai cuisine that social media can't get enough of.

11.title: Deliciously Decadent Dishes
11.plot: On this trip, Michael hits up Ramen Burger in his hometown, NYC, where they're fusing two of America's favorite meals into one delectable dish. Then he'll hit the road, where in Miami, he gets a taste of classic Cuban cooking.

12.title: Open Up Wide
12.plot: On this journey, Michael makes a stop in Austin for the some seriously sinful over the top donuts. Then he'll head to Vegas for a giant 1-pound meatball that is proof bigger really is better. He'll finish off his trip in Chicago.

14.title: Music to Your Tastebuds
14.plot: On this trip, Michael heads to Las Vegas to a Southern spot that's known to serve up America's Best Fried Chicken. Then he'll check out a New York City hotspot serving up a take on a classic Mexico City dessert that's all the rage on Instagram.

-1.title: Too Good to Eat
-1.plot: Michael Chernow experiences a feast for the senses with the delectable food masterpieces. The flavor of a vibrantly colored Thai sticky rice dessert lives up to its hype at Portland's Departure restaurant.

imdb.title: Food Porn
plot: Michael Chernow travels the country to find the most photogenic dishes that are worthy of their own selfie and deserve the hashtag "foodporn"::hafa ball
